nodes.title: The Zoey
nodes.description: This spectacular The Zoey criss-cross engagement ring makes a stylish statement. A flurry of pave-set diamonds adorns the X-crossing open split shank. A hidden halo peeks out when the ring is seen from the side or bottom. Thoughtfully designed to maximize the luxurious appeal and brilliance of your center stone.

nodes.title: The Marilyn
nodes.description: Introducing The Marilyn, an exquisite engagement ring that encapsulates the essence of everlasting love and unparalleled beauty. Inspired by the timeless allure of Marilyn Monroe, this ring harmoniously blends classic elegance with contemporary sophistication. Adorned with round brilliant channel-set diamonds, The Marilyn is a symbol of the unbreakable bond you share, a reflection of the remarkable journey you're about to embark upon together.

nodes.title: Low Profile
nodes.descriptionHtml: The center stone is set close to the band, offering a sleek and practical design. A straight wedding band won’t fit with the ring.

nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra protection to the center stone with 6 prongs.

nodes.title: Remove Hidden Halo
nodes.descriptionHtml: Remove the feature of smaller diamonds underneath the center stone (The setting design won’t change).

nodes.title: East West
nodes.descriptionHtml: Turn the center stone horizontally for a fresh, unique look.

nodes.title: Compass
nodes.descriptionHtml: A compass prong setting has four prongs aligned with the cardinal directions, highlighting the stone's beauty.

nodes.title: Bezel
nodes.descriptionHtml: A bezel setting surrounds the stone with a metal rim, providing a secure and modern look.

nodes.descriptionHtml: A striking fusion of contemporary allure and bold design, with intricately set diamonds along a widening band.

nodes.title: Tapered Pave
nodes.descriptionHtml: Delicately set diamonds along a gracefully narrowing band.

nodes.title: The Nova
nodes.description: Introducing The Nova: a masterpiece of design that elevates the concept of the side stone engagement ring to dazzling new heights. This high-profile ring is a celebration of symmetry and sparkle, featuring two mirror-image marquise diamonds on each shoulder that perfectly frame the center stone, enhancing its brilliance and beauty. Embrace the opportunity to make a bold statement of love with The Nova, a ring that promises to be as enduring and unforgettable as your love.

nodes.title: The Kristen
nodes.description: The Kristen is a fabulous engagement ring that combines geometry, aesthetics, and immense sparkle. Round and marquise cut diamond accents are set along the band in a shared-prong setting. Twin round brilliant stones flank either side of the center stone, adding size and volume.

nodes.title: The Pave Petal Kamellie
nodes.description: Introducing The Pave Petal Kamellie, a dainty and delicate symbol of eternal love. Crafted with exceptional artistry, this ring exudes romance and sophistication. The slim 1.5mm pave band showcases a breathtaking diamond, held in place by exquisite petal prongs that highlight the stone's brilliance and sparkle. Its sleek and slender design slims the finger and makes it a perfect choice for those seeking a minimalistic and modern ring.

nodes.title: The Megan
nodes.description: Introducing The Megan, a stunning three-stone sparkler that beautifully combines simplicity and sophistication. Two breathtaking pear diamonds on either side of the center stone embrace it with grace, accentuating its brilliance and shimmer. The modest and sleek band is perfect for those who prefer a refined and understated look, while the diamonds bring a touch of glamor and luxury. Crafted with unparalleled attention to detail and with a commitment to quality, The Megan is the perfect symbol of love that will last a lifetime.

nodes.title: The Claire
nodes.description: The Claire is an exquisite solitaire with a touch of stunning and unexpected sparkle. Its band features a row of glittering pave diamonds stretching around each side of the band and continuing up its delicate prongs, showcasing your center stone while surrounding your finger in sparkle from every angle.

nodes.title: The Baguettes Megan
nodes.description: The Baguettes Megan engagement ring features striking baguette diamonds on the shoulders, adding a sophisticated touch to its design. The pave prongs further enhance the brilliance, creating a dazzling frame for your center stone. With its modern yet timeless appeal, The Baguettes Megan is a stunning choice for those who want an engagement ring that exudes both glamor and refinement.

nodes.title: The Michelle
nodes.description: The Michelle has a radiant diamond halo that surrounds the center stone in a luminous embrace. This classic halo design not only enhances the sparkle but also amplifies the overall brilliance of the ring. Paired with a delicate pave band and a medium-profile setting, The Michelle balances romantic elegance with everyday comfort. It’s a graceful, eye-catching piece that celebrates lasting love with a bold yet refined presence.

nodes.title: The Abigail
nodes.description: Introducing The Abigail is a captivating symbol of love and elegance. Gracefully designed, this mesmerizing three stone engagement ring features shimmering pear and round-cut diamonds adorning the shoulders, creating a brilliant and enchanting display. The pear-shaped diamonds radiate sophistication, while the round-cut diamonds add a classic touch. Set in a lustrous band, The Abigail is a dazzling choice to declare your eternal devotion. Embrace the moment with this exquisite masterpiece today!

nodes.title: The Caroline
nodes.description: Introducing The Caroline, a masterpiece of elegance and sophistication. This luxurious ring features a stunning hidden halo design, gracefully complementing the centerpiece with an ethereal circle of diamonds nestled just beneath the main stone. It boasts a gently twisted pave band that spirals gracefully around the finger. This unique pave setting not only enhances the ring's overall sparkle but also adds a dynamic twist to its profile, making it a true standout.

nodes.title: The Halo Stephanie
nodes.description: The Halo Stephanie is a stunning halo engagement ring that combines timeless elegance with contemporary brilliance. The vintage-inspired design adds a touch of romance and sophistication, making it the perfect choice for those who appreciate the charm of bygone eras, while the diamond halo enhances the center stone's brilliance, creating a dazzling display of light and sparkle. This ring is a celebration of love, style, and timeless beauty, making it the perfect choice for the moment you say, "Forever."

nodes.title: The Jade
nodes.description: The Jade stunning split shank design features a delicate band with dynamic sparkle. A shimmering row of pave diamonds splits, continuing up the base of each prong to meet at a subtle point before descending into a diamond-studded bridge. The setting boasts glittering brilliance from all angles, making your center stone appear larger while a slimming silhouette elongates the finger.

nodes.title: Two-Tone
nodes.descriptionHtml: Create a unique look by mixing two metals. The head will be made in white gold and the band in your chosen metal.

nodes.title: Euro Shank
nodes.descriptionHtml: A modern squared base for comfortable, stylish wear.

nodes.title: Pave Prongs
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra sparkle to your setting with diamonds on the prongs.

nodes.title: All Around
nodes.descriptionHtml: Extend the diamonds on the band — all around.

nodes.title: 2.5mm Pave Band
nodes.descriptionHtml: Customize the band's width to your preference.

nodes.title: 6 Prongs (Round)
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra protection to the center stone with 6 prongs.

nodes.title: East West
nodes.descriptionHtml: Turn the center stone horizontally for a fresh, unique look.

nodes.title: The Pave Madison
nodes.description: Make your upcoming engagement absolutely unforgettable with the classic lines and perfect sparkle of The Pave Madison. This exquisite ring features petal prongs that elegantly cradle the center stone, adding a touch of whimsy and sweet romance while the slender pave diamond band maximizes the fire and brilliance of the center stone. If you're looking for utter pave perfection, this is it!

nodes.title: The Lindsey
nodes.description: The Lindsey engagement ring is a true showstopper that combines modern flair with timeless elegance. The band of this stunning hidden halo style ring is partially adorned with a breathtaking array of marquise and round cut diamonds, all securely held in shared prongs. The intricate design ensures maximum sparkle and brilliance, making The Lindsey an heirloom-quality piece that is both contemporary and enduring. Perfect for those who seek a ring that captures attention and admiration, The Lindsey epitomizes everlasting love.

nodes.title: The Cameron
nodes.description: The Cameron is a harmonious blend of classic elegance and contemporary charm, designed to make a proposal truly unforgettable. A masterfully designed hidden halo nestles just beneath the center stone, offering an intimate glow that magnifies the stone's radiance — a secret shared between you and your beloved. The band has exquisite channel-set diamonds extending halfway around the circumference, securing their brilliance for a lifetime.

nodes.title: The Celine
nodes.description: The Celine engagement ring is a sparkly yet tasteful choice for those who appreciate shimmery elegance. Round diamonds are beautifully set on three sides of the shank, offering a brilliant display of light while a hidden halo adds a subtle flicker of shimmer that enhances the overall design. The Celine’s refined and eye-pleasing aesthetics make it the perfect ring for anyone seeking a timeless yet dazzling symbol of love and commitment.

nodes.title: The Lenny
nodes.description: Meet The Lenny, a spectacular diamond halo engagement ring. pave-set diamonds run along the band and extend to X-shaped claws cradling the center stone. A glamorous-but-elegant design with plenty of brilliance and flash.

nodes.title: The Miley
nodes.description: Introducing The Miley engagement ring, our majestic split shank halo design that dazzles with unmatched brilliance. The double diamond-set shoulders seamlessly connect to a magnificent halo, creating an extraordinary display of size and sparkle. This entrancing ring offers a level of opulence and magnificence that is perfect for any occasion. With its bold yet elegant design, The Miley is a timeless symbol of love and commitment, destined to leave a lasting impression.

nodes.title: The Chelsea
nodes.description: The Chelsea engagement ring is perfect if you want to combine decadence with fine, tasteful lines. Marquise-cut and round diamonds run semi-band, with twin marquises cradling the center stone in a stunning display of light. A marriage of delicate romance and immaculate craftsmanship.

nodes.title: The Claudia
nodes.description: Step into a world of timeless elegance with The Claudia, a vintage-style engagement ring that captures the essence of Old World romance. A hidden halo adds a touch of surprise sparkle while marquise diamonds, intricate beading, and a delicate engraving along the band add an artisanal touch. Perfect for those who appreciate the beauty of vintage design, this engagement ring is a true testament to enduring elegance and timeless charm.

nodes.title: The Jennifer
nodes.description: The Jennifer is a stunning piece that perfectly combines vintage luxury with modern elegance. The channel-set baguette diamonds give the ring a classic and timeless look, while also adding a touch of contemporary sophistication. With a dazzling sparkle and impeccable craftsmanship, The Jennifer is the epitome of effortless style and grace, making it the perfect choice for anyone who wants a ring that truly stands out. Make your special moment even more magical with this exquisite piece of jewelry that will be cherished for a lifetime.
